website_summaries.verdict: The Canon Pixma iP90v is the Vista-enabled version of the older Pixma iP90 and offers nearly the same print speeds and quality. It's a very useful printer if you travel a lot and need to print often, but consider the purchase carefully because it's quite expensive.
pros: Text quality has improved over the last version
very compact design makes it easy to carry with you
ink-saving modes can save you in a pinch
cons: The printer is expensive, and add-ons such as battery packs make it moreso
photo print speed is slower than that of the older model

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, compact printer
customer_reviews.text: The printer was small enough to fit into my rolling computer bag with no problem. It doesn't seem to add much weight to the bag either. Set up and use is a breeze. Print quality is not on the level of a laser printer but it is very good for it's size. The printer ink cartridges are tiny but I guess I shouldn't have been surprised. The printer is also fairly rugged. It has bounced around in my computer bag for the past month with no problems. All things considered, this was a great purchase and it has served very well as a portable printer. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Great printer to take on the road.
customer_reviews.text: I occasionally have to take my office with me on short trips. I'd been wanting a printer that could fit in my laptop bag along with the computer and associated cables and peripherals. This one fits the bill. It's quite compact and produces perfectly satisfactory prints. I've made a couple of photo prints (which are surprisingly good), but I use it principally for text. I don't know yet how economical it will be (cost of ink cartridges), but there simply aren't many portable printers that will produce full letter size prints as this one does. I'm very satisfied with the iP90v.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portable travel printer
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these for work and will purchase more. We have mobile reps that travel around to customer sites with a laptop and printer. These printers have a very small footprint and the cartridges are reasonably priced. It also has a separate B&W cartridge and a Color cartridge. This is big for us since we only need to print in B&W and hence we do not need to purchase expensive color cartridges. To top it off, the price is great. I purchased mine from Adorama through Amazon. They have been a very good vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Product Guru

customer_reviews.title: Best printer
customer_reviews.text: I love this little printer it's the size of a book. I can't believe I got it for only $100. It prints the pages so nice and clean. And it doesn't have any problem with the chords. I had another printer and the cord never quite fit and it would disconnect in the middle of the prints. This one so much better efficient and the ink is really cheap. I got 10 black ink for $12
customer_reviews.author: ALICE COPPERS

customer_reviews.title: Canon Compact PIXMA i990v Printer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this printer because it was compact in size and the info material said it was compatable with Microsoft VISTA. My older PIXMA ip4200 would not print correctly with VISTA. My husband looked for updated downloads at Canon, but he could not find that model in the list provided. This printer works just fine. The color is good and the ink refills are not very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Shopper in TX

customer_reviews.title: Nice Printer
customer_reviews.text: This portable printer was exactly what I was looking for. The HP 400 series were too bulky for my backpack. Pros: Size is great. The picture quality is great. Easy to install. The battery lasts long, even thought you must purchase it separately. Cons: Very slow to print. I personally had no problem with the speed of print, but it is slower than most other printers.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Changed my mind about this product.
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was going to be just what i needed. It worked less than month and is now broke. I will NEVER but another used printer. Money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Waldon Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great printer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer because I wanted detailed and perfect color prints for my artwork. I have an HP photosmart at home, which is okay, but doesn't compare to the quality of the Canon. I also bought the battery pack for travel, but haven't used it yet. This printer is worth the money and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great with Windows XP Tablet PC
customer_reviews.text: It's a little heftier than I would like but the print quality is good. The setup is easy. Manuals are very good and the insert takes through setup step-by-step with photos. Not 5 stars because no printer cable is included. Drivers for Vista OS can now be downloaded from the Canon website but I haven't tried that yet.
customer_reviews.author: PearlGirlTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: excellent printer...good looking item also.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, just follow the instructions step by step, surprisingly beautiful,fast, good color...haven't run out of ink yet so I dont know how expensive it will get from warnings from other reviews....Excellent product, quiet...wish it has a scanner like the old model.
customer_reviews.author: haha

customer_reviews.title: Canon PIXMA iP90v
customer_reviews.text: I was a full time RV'er when I purchased this printer. One of the reasons I purchased this particular printer was because of it's smallness. I needed something compact to travel with. It has turned out to be a great reliable printer. It's quality for photos is great. Now that I am no longer traveling I still can't see a need to update the printer. It works well setting on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Hermit

customer_reviews.title: Little engine that could!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third i90 Printer I've bought in the last 6 years. It's portable, it's a workhorse that just keeps going, and it takes up very little real estate on my desk. I don't use it for photos as often as just every day printing. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: A. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Canon ip90
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little printer for dragging around. I am a home inspector doing on site printing. The only drawback I see is that I get about 40 pages per black cartridge, however the tanks are cheap and small, I just have to carry several for when they run out. Other than that it is small, light weight, and works great. I print mostly text and mostly black, not any photos except my logos. I do not yet use the wireless or battery options but expect to in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Scott at Honest Home Inspections

customer_reviews.title: Canon  IP90v
customer_reviews.text: I love these little printers and the quality they produce. However this is my third model because they simply wear out! I am now using the IP100 model. I also wish you could put in a larger ink cartridge.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Portable Printer
customer_reviews.text: I sell Arbonne products and I wanted to be able to print out receipts at my parties. I bought this printer to take along. It's fantastic! It fits in my laptop bag with my laptop. I also bought the battery so I don't have to worry about plugging in somewhere. The print quality is fantastic and I'm very impressed. For the price, it is one of the best printers I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Driver

customer_reviews.title: Great little work horse!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this printer for 3 years and traveled with it all over the world. It has great durability and print quality. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerGC

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer- great price and terrific service
customer_reviews.text: It has been difficult to find a suitably portable printer to go with my Macbook pro, until I discovered this little gem. It completes my office on the go- all fits neatly into my Targus rolling backpack. Not to mention it is a great little printer. It does really nice and fast pages- images etc. almost better than my expensive and very large color laser printer. It is a snap to set up and the pages are printed before the color laser is finished warming up!
customer_reviews.author: Norma Jean Almodovar

customer_reviews.title: Great printer
customer_reviews.text: I had a I70 for 4 years and it work fine but I started having problems with the print head for color prints. I purchase a IP90v to replace the I70. I use it in my job. I move around a lot and the printer does a great job. Using the right paper the IP90v does a great job on pictures also.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Super portable
customer_reviews.text: The ip90v, my laptop, and both power supplies fit nicely in a laptop case. I used it as my carry-on luggage to South Africa. The printer exceeded my expectation in speed, ease of use and portability. Dual voltage made it more convenient to use with 240 volts in Africa.
customer_reviews.author: G. S. Patton

customer_reviews.title: Cannon Printer a Winner
customer_reviews.text: Love the Canon Pixma iP90v printer. It is small (which was my first requirement), efficient, and easy to set up, and use. It arrived very quickly to my home in Maui and works beautifully and takes up very little space. VERY glad I ordered it!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ness

customer_reviews.title: A necessity for those who work and travel
customer_reviews.text: Very please with my new printer. I also like the fact that it has a dual voltage so I can travel with it to Europe.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvie

customer_reviews.title: Cannon iP90v
customer_reviews.text: This printer is exactly what I've been looking for. It's compact so I can take it with me when I travel, simple to use and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Regina M. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Cool little printer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer for portability. When coupled with the rechargeable battery and bluetooth, it is perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Jim R.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This item is great. It was very easy to install and didn't take long at all. The quality is great. This is exactly what I was looking for. I needed something small and portable. This works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: V. L. Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Canon PIXMA iP90v Photo Inkjet Printer
customer_reviews.text: Gives great output from a small size. Easy to use and the printout is just great.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Ishmael

customer_reviews.title: OK so far
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat heavy for a portable printer.I would purchase again tho.It is well built and had no trouble hooking it up to my Vista laptop.So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Mark S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous little wizard
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool product. It is as small as a large book and prints incredibly sharp pictures very fast. For people on the go who need to print, I highly recommend it. Easy to install, USB.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence Hillman

customer_reviews.title: Great printer, great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer so I could print out spreadsheets in the field. I love it!! Amazon had the best price, and it was delivered within the week. Good job people!
customer_reviews.author: J. Bogna

customer_reviews.title: Cannon Pixma iP90v my best purchase for 2008
customer_reviews.text: I love this printer. It fits in my computer bag along with my lap top. It is very portable, easy to hook up. The print quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Z

customer_reviews.title: Not Satisfied..
customer_reviews.text: I received PIXMA printer and there were screws missing and the rod that the carriage rides on was loose and it didn't print or work. After my email, they responded quickly and gave me a return number, I returned it over a week or so ago and haven't heard anything since. Gib gfranc3223@aol.com
customer_reviews.author: Gib

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted this for Christmas. He set it up and printed a great pic. He wants it for when we travel. Very small, great printing.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy DO

customer_reviews.title: Can anyone answer a question for me?
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a question, not a review. Can anyone tell me if i can print wirelessly from my LAPTOP to this printer. I've seen all over the place information about printing from cameras or handheld devices. What i really want is to be able to print from my laptop. Can anyone help???
customer_reviews.author: J. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: excellent printer
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent printer for the price. very easy setup. Only con is small capacity ink cartridges
customer_reviews.author: Judy Milligan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS LITTLE PRINTER
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A GREAT LITTLE PRINTER, I REALLY LOVE IT, IT IS WELL WORTH THE MONEY, BUY IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: N. Semerdjian

customer_reviews.title: had to return it
customer_reviews.text: i bought this item for my son, thinking he could take it when he travels. however, it was too big and heavy and i had to return it. he said if it also faxed and copied, it might be worth packing, but not for just a printer. i'm sure it's a nice home printer, but just didn't fill his needs.
customer_reviews.author: s'me

customer_reviews.title: Travel and Need a Printer - Buy This One
customer_reviews.text: On occasion I travel as a special investigator. In the past I've relied on hotel business centers to print documents I needed before going back to the office. After doing extensive research on portable printers, and somewhat relying on the Canon name, I purchased the Pixma iP90v. This printer is fast, compact, and lightweight. Not only does it quickly spit out black and white, it's color printing capability is better than many inkjets. Although the price seemed a little high considering the current cost of inkjet printers, it was well worth the investment. I highly recommend it if you need a printer "on the road."
customer_reviews.author: R. Beers

customer_reviews.title: Great portable printer, except for one thing...
customer_reviews.text: I received this printer as a Christmas gift from my parents, since I admired their same model. Printing speed, resolution, and color look just as good as my larger HP Photosmart. The size and weight make for relative ease in mobility; it fits nicely in my school bag. The only issue I have with the printer is not with the printer, it's with Canon. For the price of this printer ($319 original price), I would think they could throw in a USB cable. Other than the inconvenience of an additional trip to the Radio Shack, the printer is great.
customer_reviews.author: tobyjames914

customer_reviews.title: Great little portable printer
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my husband as a present. He loves it. Very compact, but prints clearly, including great photos. Portable for use while "on the road." One caution -- printer does not come with a USB cable to connect to a computer, and the box does not indicate the need for one. Bought one at a local discount store for $10, so not a big deal, but it would have been nice to know in advance. This printer will print without cable, if you enable the bluetooth, and can also printer via infrared with your PDA/cellphone or Blackberry. Overall, a nice little unit.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dickmyer

customer_reviews.title: Great portable printer
customer_reviews.text: The printer works great. I recommend buying the battery and bluetooth accessories. Price is a little steep, but you should see the experession on my client's faces when I pull out my laptop with a wireless internet card along with my wireless printer. It makes my office completely portable. I did think I would use the printer more, but old habits die hard. It is nice to know I have it in my car, and it has saved me a couple of times already when I needed a form I did not have.
customer_reviews.author: Terr-Bear

customer_reviews.title: have had this for some time now canon made this line built to work
customer_reviews.text: I have this guy and had to let the amazon community know that this does not disappoint. use it all the time workhorse.....a+
customer_reviews.author: Ruben_NYC

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Portable Printer
customer_reviews.text: I use my printer with battery pack when I am on the road. I carry it with my laptop in a backpack computer bag and always have it with my laptop. The printer was easy to set up and does a perfect job of printing text and graphics. Does an excellent job on color photos, although the color isn't quite as good as my full size cannon photo printer. The printer is fast enough and the battery charge lasts a long time. It seems like I rarely have to charge it. I'm very pleased with the printer and would highly recommend it for portable use.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Myking

customer_reviews.title: Nice printer, but didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Purchased less than two years ago, and it stopped printing in black ink (only color). Take a look through [...] and find out how many other people had this exact same issue! After getting in touch with Canon, they were able to provide a discount on a new printer. Servicing this one did not make sense given that the diagnostic fee from the authorized Canon service center was $80+. Worked great for the time that I had it though.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Philip

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable printer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer to travel with and the size was perfect to fit in with a laptop in a travel bag. The printing was high quality for the first year. Also it fed pretty quickly for such a small printer. Unfortunately the roller stopped feeding paper after about a year of use. This has been a common problem I've seen with some of these smaller printers and I guess they are just not made to last.
customer_reviews.author: Tess S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome portable printer
customer_reviews.text: This little printer is a great printer if you need something portable but with the functionality of a full size printer. Print quality and speed are great. I used this printer to print paychecks for about 400 employees when I was on vacation, and it worked like a dream. No paper jams or any issues at all. It was set up and printing within 10 minutes of delivery. The ink cartridges are tiny so be sure to bring along extras if you are traveling. I was so impressed with this printer that I replaced my printer at home with a full siza Canon Pixma printer.
customer_reviews.author: R. Placek

customer_reviews.title: Great travel printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer is truly portable and easy to use. I travel with medical teams to developing countries and have taken it on several trips. Works fine with 240V power outlets, ink cartridges are small but cheap and easy to pack. It works fine as a "work horse" for larger projects like printing pharmacy labels, but I especially appreciate the ability to complete high-quality projects like printing out certificates and pictures for gifts. I like it so much we've purchased a second for other teams to use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pascoe

customer_reviews.title: BEST portable printer
customer_reviews.text: I travel 330 day out of the year and constantly writting reports and turning in expense reports...and my company requires paper copies on everything. I have had other printers over the past 15 years of traveling.. BUT... for reliability, compact size(fits inside same small bag as my laptop)and ease of use there is no other printer. So..if you want or need the convience of a full size sheet printer in a compact and reliable size...BUY IT! YOU will be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Brummett

customer_reviews.title: iP90v Photo Inkjet Printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer is very easy to set up , easy to carry with the box it comes in , and prints clearly. The only negative thing (if you can call it that is) it uses the black cartridges fast when you print lots of black & white documents only. I just wish the black ink cartridges were bigger (lol).
customer_reviews.author: Alex 0.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: this printer is just what i needed, it prints fast, and the quality is as expected. installing it on both a macbook and a windows laptop was a breeze, it is perfect for on the go printing and if you buy the battery which for me is worth it because of travel needs (i usually print in my car) the device holds a good charge, overall very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ronny Farfan

customer_reviews.title: Too Bad...Otherwise, Very Good
customer_reviews.text: All I have to say is, I really love the printer, other than, the door hinge did indeed break early on. I've tried to glue it, but after 5 different times of fixing it and having it break again, I am now searching to see if a new door is available, and what extra cost I'll have to pay. Still, not sorry I purchased the printer, as the size and operation are perfect for our business needs.
customer_reviews.author: Henry (Hank) Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Printer!!!
customer_reviews.text: My first printer (Canon I70) lasted me six years. I started using generic printer cartridges and they jammed my printer so I had to purchase a new one... iP90v. I don't know why everyone doesn't have one of these printers for their laptop. It's small, prints great, and the canon ink cartridges last a good amount of time. I use this printer on a daily basis and I couldn't be happier with it's performance. Bottom line is this... This is one good printer.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sias

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Printer for on the Go....
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little printer. We had the i70 and replaced it with the new iP90v. It's lightwieight, can be easiley transported, for an inkjet the color quality is good and it prints pretty quick too! Would definatley recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marek in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sized portable printer. We've only had it a short time and just used it a few times, but it works great. It's very light weight and easy to take along. So far we've been very pleased with it. It's not a high-end photo printer, but it does a nice job of printing.
customer_reviews.author: 1flowergirl

customer_reviews.title: Canon on the road
customer_reviews.text: I'm now at my 3rd Canon travel printer, and still very happy with them! I was looking for a wireless printer and for battery energy. Now I have both, Bluetooth which works perfectly well. I'm amazed about the longevity of the battery! Printing quality is perfect for my needs... (I make my own picture "postcards" which get admired by everybody I send them to)
customer_reviews.author: photofan

customer_reviews.title: Canon portable printer does what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This printer is small and produces excellent quality. The infrared is a little finicky. The battery is good for a couple of hours; for the price it should last longer. So while not as good for ease of traveling without wires as it could be, it is great with wires. I'm quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Phruce

customer_reviews.title: Canon iP90v Portable Printer
customer_reviews.text: I got this printer as a replacement for my HP450 portable printer. The Canon is smaller and operates better than the HP. It prints quickly and feeds properly (a problem with the HP). I've had the printer about a month, and things have gone well so far. Hopefully, I won't have any feed problems!
customer_reviews.author: James D. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Canon Pixma iP90v Photo Inkjet Printer
customer_reviews.text: Wanted it for the motor home and for that, it was great. Expense of ink sort of negated by the fact that I never used up the ink in my other printer before it went bad.
customer_reviews.author: happy reader

customer_reviews.title: portable printer
customer_reviews.text: This portable printer is great. Small, well constructed. Be forewarned though- it says blue tooth / wireless capable, but in order to make this happen you have to buy another part that costs 90.00. If it will be in one place but you want small and don't mind a corded printer it is great.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Travel Printer
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy being able to take a printer when I travel. It takes full size paper and prints in color. It has WIFI and uses Bluetooth as well. It is fast and does as good a job as my larger printers. It goes right in my laptop carrier bag and away we go. I recently bought a internet tablet so I could, if I carries a large handbag get both in there. I'm very pleased with its quality and it is light.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy A. Ryker

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Printer
customer_reviews.text: I am a trial lawyer who travels alot. I needed something that I could use in the hotel room at night for last minute changes to documents, outlines, etc. The Canon iP90 works just as advertised and travels like a dream. I highly recommend it. I did not get the Bluetooth set up or extra battery because my expected use will be in a hotel where power will always be available.
customer_reviews.author: Truegryt

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Canon Pixma IP90 that I have owned, my last one being destroyed by a cat and a precariously placed lava lamp, and I have to say it is one of my favorite things I own. It works like a champ, comes with excellent service from Canon, and is small, beautiful, and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Mast

customer_reviews.title: I love this printer
customer_reviews.text: I love this printer! I actually had it's older sister/brother and I finally wore it out. I travel coast to coast and it goes with me. It's light and easy to use. Glenda Cali
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Lima

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer
customer_reviews.text: I was thoroughly impressed by the quickness and clearness of print. The printer can be lugged anywhere to use. The printer cartridges are used quickly, so make sure buy double the printer cartridges when printing a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J Koopman

customer_reviews.title: cannon pixma ip90v
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and prints quick. Have not tested the blue tooth technology. A little heavy for transporting. Overall 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Great Versatile Compact Photo Printer
customer_reviews.text: Great Printer, Had Canon BJC-80 with scanner and love it but new laptop didn't have printer ports anymore only USB. So I decided to get another Canon, this time with Blue Tooth, The Old one had Infrared so it was wireless too. Keep the quality products coming Canon!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Keith Yee

customer_reviews.title: exactly what i wanted.
customer_reviews.text: he printer was delivered on time and in an unmarked box which was perfect for the holidays. the printer itself is easy to install and works very well. the price was also remarkable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kaper

customer_reviews.title: Canon picture printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer is great. It is compact but prints clearly and precisely. The colors reflect real life. It prints quickly and although the cartridges are tiny, they last a while.
customer_reviews.author: alli sue

customer_reviews.title: Great printer, but the box doesn't contain required cable
customer_reviews.text: Beware, although this is a great printer, the box doesn't contain the cable required to connect the printer to a PC. And the product description doesn't make it clear that the cable isn't included, nor does Amazon list the cable as being a product most people purchase with this printer. So imagine my surprise as I tried to set up this printer at my vacation home, only to learn from Canon support that I needed to drive to a store to purchase the required cable. Otherwise, great printer.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Canon IP90V - Great printer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mobile printer.. works very well with windows vista.. fast printing.. and cheap ink cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: Walter W. Keener

customer_reviews.title: Love this printer
customer_reviews.text: I previously had the Canon i70 printer for about 4 years and loved it. When it finally bit the dust, I got the successor: Canon i90v. They are amazingly small for the quality print jobs. Travel well too!
customer_reviews.author: J. Oneil

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: I bought the canon ip80, the canon ip90 and finally the canon ip90v because of the portability. All of them failed long before the should have. I will never buy a canon product again. They are marketed to be mobile but they cannot survive the simplest trips. At this point (after 4 pritners in a year) it is cheaper to go back and use the business center at the hotel no matter what it costs. At least I don't have to carry a broken printer in my breifcase or luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Downey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect printer, great "on the road"
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little printer on the desk and it also travels well, fits into the side pocket of a laptop bag. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Janis

customer_reviews.title: excellent portable printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great portable printer. The infrared port is great if you use a PDA and need to print reports for clients.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Canon IP90 Printer
customer_reviews.text: This is the second IP90 printer I have owned and the printer is excellent. Dependable, portable and cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: S. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: software nightmare
customer_reviews.text: The unit is a great size and I like its size. However the installation was a nightmare and I eventualy gave up. If it takes this much energy to install the soft ware it makes me nervous for the future computer conflicts. Also I was disapointed that the unit did not come with a USB cord to attach the printer to the computer
customer_reviews.author: James Mcginnis

customer_reviews.title: not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My printer arrived, minus two critical components: 1) no usb cable--nice if manufacturer told me--I could have at least ordered one right away, and 2) no color ink cartridge. Printer doesn't work without it (obviously). So here I sit. Easier just to go to Best Buy and purchase one than to screw around with Amazon or Canon. I'm very displeased with the unnecessary hassles.
customer_reviews.author: William G. Bodette

product_meta.title: Canon PIXMA iP90v Photo Inkjet Printer (2238B002)
product_meta.description:
Rugged, powerful and portable (only 4lbs), this compact printer delivers exceptional performance on the go. You can print wirelessly from PCs and camera phones via the IrDA interface or our optional Bluetooth adapter Or, print photos direct from a PictBridge-enabled digital camera or DV camcorder --no PC required! AMAZON.COM
Rugged, powerful, and portable, the Canon Pixma iP90v is a compact photo printer that delivers exceptional performance and a multitude of time-saving options on the go. With the iP90v, you can print wirelessly from PCs and camera phones via the IrDA interface or by using the optional Bluetooth adapter. You can even print photos directly from a PictBridge-enabled digital camera or DV camcorder--no PC required. For maximum portability, an optional Canon car adapter and rechargeable battery kit provide power anywhere, anytime. Wherever you're printing from, the iP90v produces superb graphics and photos that catch the eye, and documents that feature bold, crisp text.

 This versatile printer uses Canon's FINE print head technology for impressive speed and photo-lab-quality results. In addition, precision ink nozzles create high-resolution photos of up to 4800 x 1200 dots per inch (dpi), while microscopic two-picoliter-sized color ink droplets deliver sharp, finely detailed photos. And if you're not thrilled with the results of your printed image, the iP90v includes Easy-Photoprint software that makes it simple to enhance and print all your images so they result in truly memorable prints.

 When it comes to printing text, the iP90v is equally impressive. It easily handles a wide variety of paper sizes, including credit card (great for printing business cards), 4 by 6, 5 by 7, letter, legal, and envelopes. This printer also comes with a 1-year limited warranty.

 What's in the Box
CD-ROM including printer driver, setup software and user's guide, electronic photo application guide, electronic user's guide, e-registration, Easy-PhotoPrint (Windows/Mac), PhotoRecord 7 (Windows), Easy-WebPrint (Windows only, requires Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5.5, version 6.0 recommended. Not compatible with IE version 7.0.), and a 1-year limited warranty.

Microscopic 2-picoliter-sized color ink droplets produce finely detailed photos
Prints wirelessly from PCs and camera phones via IrDA and optional Bluetooth
Dimensions: 12.3 x 2.1 x 6.9 in. (WxHxD); weighs 4.0 pounds
